name: 范政揆
objective: 講解新產品開發流程的企畫、設計、製造等知識，並演練運用解決複雜的產品設計開發問題之系統化設計方法、快速手繪以及立體電腦模型表現，延續並運用大一與大二課程所學之美學、人因工程、工學、電腦繪圖等各方面知識與技能。
schedule:
3/4 WK3 : 主題資料蒐集與分析
                 1.健康醫療  2.娛樂  3.綠設計 Team build up / 6 people
3/11 WK4 : 資料蒐集簡報 (18 min/ team)   
                     Observation  Presentation, What you See ? 
3/18 WK5 : 研究分析簡報 (18 min/ team 發表)
                     1.整體與未來趨勢 2.主題現況 3.市場現況
                       Topic review 全民公審 (is that good point? )
3/25 WK6 : 研究分析修正 / 1.User Scenario  
                                                  2. Environment Study
                     Second Review (Team discussion)成為別人的天使  
               (what is your suggestion ?  What is your point of view?)
4/1 WK7 :研究分析修正 (Team discussion)
4/8 WK8 : 研究分析最終簡報 Research Final Presentation
                  (PPT 18 min/ team ; A1 Poster )
                   1. Problem definition , Market Trend , Technology 
                       ,Product ,Design Direction 
                   2. Rough Sketch for Scenario 
                   3. Image board (User & Style) , Keyword      
4/15 WK9 : Concept Sketch ( A3 x 10 / for each )
4/22 WK10 : Concept Sketch  ( A3 x 10 / for each )
4/29 WK11 : 2D Rendering  1. 1:1 _6 view drawing  
5/6 WK12 : 1. Problem definition , User Needs , Technology , 
                        Design Direction , Innovation  point 
                     2. Sketch & Scenario , Use process
                     3. Image board (Target User & Style) , Keyword    
5/13 WK13 : 2D Rendering & UI flow present 
5/20 WK14 : 產品軟硬整合(外觀操作與使用介面) /
                      使用流程&情境  (A2 Poster )
                      1. 產品精緻彩繪  2D Rendering 
                      2. 產品六面圖       6 view in 1:1 Dimension  
                      3. 使用流程            Process (include interface design ) 
5/27 WK15 : 3D立體建模 3D Model building
                        1.Draft angle check  
                        2. CMF first version 3. Check PL  
6/3 WK16 : 3D finish / Rendering / A0 Poster design review 
6/10 WK17 : 設計週 Design Week ( A0 / A1 x 2 Poster)
                       1. Problem definition , Technology ,Product 
                       2. Scenario & Process 
                       3. Image board (Target User & Style) , Keyword      
6/17 WK18 : 個人學期作品集 6/20 繳交截止 (10%)、
6/24 WK19 : (6/23)暑假開始、(6/27)學期成績繳交截止

name: 黃子坤
